name: W.C.G: Weird Car Game
description:
Want to play a car game but the game size is small? want a car game with a very wide map? this game is the solution !! play with a white BMW and adventure in 3 wide maps !! the game is happy to receive feedback !!

what's in this game?

- 3 COOL MAPS !!

SNOWTRAIN

This map is very wide! filled with snow in the mountains and on the highway! Walk in the heavy snow and explore the map!

SUNSETROAD

Want to see the sunset but can't? calm ! enter this map and see the beautiful sunset while walking in the cold mountains !!

SUNNYLAKE

wow! want to sunbathe? no problem ! in this SunnyLake map you can walk on the side of the road or on the highway please if you want to take photos! ha ha. if you want to enter the fund please you can !!

- COOL BMW Cars ! 

want to ride a BMW but can't? no problem ! here you can damage, ride, sink, and much more!! basically you can do anything to the car!!

AND MORE !!

so what are you waiting for download it now !!

Credits :

- A game by DCGame

- Made with Unity

- Mini Map by Turzo

- Map By Niandrei, Shahbaz awan, Abdulrahim

- Music Safe And Sound by Different Heaven

Free Download / Stream: http://ncs.io/safeandsound
